section.title: Requirement
section.p: DITA requires the installation of the Java Development Kit (JDK). It is not sufficient to have the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) installed. The current version (Oct 2011) is 1.6.0_27. If you change the standard installation folder C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_27, then you also have to adjust the build.bat files in each of the Documentation folders accordingly.

section.title: Authoring tool
section.p: Serna Free is used as authoring tool. It contains DITA-OT (Open Toolkit) as publishing tool.
The installation folder is C:\Program Files\Syntext\Serna Free 4.3\.

The DITA-OT comes in versions 1.3.1 and 1.4. They get installed as plugins at C:\Program Files\Syntext\Serna Free 4.3\plugins\dita\DITA-OT1.3.1 and at C:\Program Files\Syntext\Serna Free 4.3\plugins\dita\DITA-OT1.4. If you change the standard installation folders, then you also have to adjust the build.bat files in each of the Documentation folders accordingly.

section.title: Publishing tool
section.p: DITA-OT (Open Toolkit) is used as processing tool. It is available at .
The current version (Jun 2011) is 1.5.3, which is prefered over the old version 1.4 coming with Serna Free 4.3.

Following the directory structure of Serna, it's best to install DITA 1.5.3 at C:\Program Files\Syntext\Serna Free 4.3\plugins\dita\DITA-OT1.5.3. This location is also assumed by the build scripts (see last section).
